lead_paragraph: FELDHEIM--Gerald Z.,on March 19, 2016. Beloved husband of Lynn Szerlip Cleaver Feldheim. Loving father of Jen (Frank), Rachel and Deborah (Lisa). Adoring grandfather of Rachel and Max. Stepfather of Emily Lott and Michael Cleaver. Passionate sailor and avid golfer, friend to many. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FELDHEIM, GERALD Z.

snippet: FELDHEIM--Gerald Z.,on March 19, 2016. Beloved husband of Lynn Szerlip Cleaver Feldheim. Loving father of Jen (Frank), Rachel and Deborah (Lisa). Adoring grandfather of Rachel and Max. Stepfather of Emily Lott and Michael Cleaver. Passionate sailor and avid golfer, friend to many. 1/3
